short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you easily control the current tab brightness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Does your favorite website or application lack a dark mode? Experiencing eye strain from overly bright screens? Lumitabs is here to solve those issues.

Lumitabs is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to give you control over the brightness of your current tab. It's like adding a personal dimmer switch to each website or application, reducing the luminosity to a level that suits your eyes.

Whether you're browsing late at night or simply want a more relaxed browsing experience, Lumitabs provides an immediate solution. No longer do you have to wait for a website or app to add a dark mode â€“ with Lumitabs, you're in control.

Simply install the extension, adjust the brightness slider on your current tab, and instantly notice the difference. Lumitabs not only gives you a more personalized browsing experience but also helps to reduce eye fatigue. Give your eyes the comfort they deserve with Lumitabs.

Lighten up or darken down, the choice is at your fingertips with Lumitabs.
